scenes.action_text: THE BLING RING Written by Sofia Coppola Shooting Script White March 06, 2012 Blue Revision March 16, 2012 Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. @KhloeKardashian 2. 1 EXT. HOLLYWOOD HILLS MANSION - NIGHT 1 A Toyota parks and five teenagers get out and walk towards us, down a quiet residential street in the Hollywood Hills. One of them,
